benchmark_details.name: E-chat200
benchmark_details.overview: E-chat200 dataset, designed explicitly for emotion-sensitive spoken dialogue.
benchmark_details.data_type: tuples of (question text, response, emotion, question speech)

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable a dialogue system capable of understanding and responding to various emotional cues in speech.

data.source: Developed specifically for E-chat's requirements, includes tuples of (question text, response, emotion, question speech).
data.annotation: Generated with the aid of GPT-3.5-Turbo and Microsoft's TTS API for high-quality speech.

methodology.calculation: Performance is based on comparison with baseline models.
methodology.interpretation: Higher MOS indicates better emotional expression and response accuracy.
methodology.baseline_results: E-chat exhibited high performance compared to ParalinGPT and GPT-3.5.
methodology.validation: E-chat200 dataset allows for a comprehensive evaluation of emotion-sensitive dialogue.
